query:
SELECT c.id, c.userId, c.title, c.status, c.createdAt, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goals WHERE cycleId = c.id) as goalCount
FROM cycles c 
WHERE c.userId = 60011 
ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user iNhAe1dL1wzAkH4.root --database 7YT5AjFkoqfS5QKmXhFci2 --execute SELECT c.id, c.userId, c.title, c.status, c.createdAt, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goals WHERE cycleId = c.id) as goalCount
FROM cycles c 
WHERE c.userId = 60011 
ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC
